sourcesContent:
<template src="./InvestStocks.html"></template>
<style scoped src="./InvestStocks.css"></style>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: 'InvestStocks',
  data() {
    return {
      fields: [
        {
          key: 'stocks',
          label: 'Stocks',
          sortable: true
        },
        {
          key: 'unitePrice',
          label: 'Unit Price (Tk) Gain/Loss (%)',
          sortable: true
        },
        {
          key: 'yearToDate',
          label: 'Year to Date',
          sortable: true,
        }
      ],
      items: []
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    axios
        .get('http://localhost:8081/api/v1/products')
        .then(response => {
          this.items = response.data.content;
          this.items.forEach(item => {
            item.stocks = item.productName
          })
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.log(error)
        })
  }
}
</script>
